thread.title: RCN Business Deploys 330 Mbps Internet Tier Across New York Market
thread.title_full: RCN Business Deploys 330 Mbps Internet Tier Across New York Market

author: AnnMarie DePaulis
title: RCN Business Deploys 330 Mbps Internet Tier Across New York Market
text:
RCN Business , a communications provider delivering network solutions for voice, data and video, announces today it has deployed 330 Mbps Internet service across its New York City business market. The increased speed enables small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs) to utilize greater amounts of content and support more employees. Businesses can now enjoy a significant boost in Internet speed to help support an ever-growing number of bandwidth-intensive applications. With RCN Business’ fast 330 Mbps Internet service, companies will have the ability to collaborate and communicate in a more efficient manner. As new phenomena like Bring Your Own Device (BYOD) and the Internet of Things (IoT) continue to rise in the workplace, the need for faster Internet is required to keep pace. SMBs require a robust and flexible communications infrastructure to accommodate existing IT requirements and the ability to adjust as their business needs change.
“RCN continues to invest in its advanced wholly owned fiber-rich network and the people necessary to support it,” states Bruce Abbott, Vice President and General Manager at RCN New York. “We are dedicated to providing our clients with the most robust and reliable communications services available anywhere. This speed makes New York a premier destination for businesses looking for high bandwidth at a comparatively low cost.”
RCN Business offers a full suite of products, including its full-featured Business Phone with Call Manager and Hosted Voice, along with flexible video packages. The new 330 Mbps Internet speed tier is available immediately.
Additional information about RCN Business’s services can be found at rcn.com/business or by calling 1-877-726-7000.
 # # #
About RCN Business Services
RCN Business Service provides industry-leading high-speed Internet, voice, video and network solutions to businesses of all sizes. Delivered through a wholly-owned, state-of-the-art fiber-rich network and supported by 100% U.S.-based customer service, RCN Business serves businesses in Boston, Chicago, Philadelphia, Lehigh Valley (PA), Washington, D.C., and New York City. RCN Business received the Metro Ethernet Forum’s CE 2.0 certification in the E-Line, E-LAN and E-Access categories in 2014.
